title: "Face recognition's staying power"
excerpt: "Facial recognition's deployment in everyday consumer devices, like iPhone's Face ID, has accustomed much of the public to its use. A Pew survey from 2019 showed that a majority of U.S. respondents trusted law enforcement to use facial recognition responsibly."
